actions.anchor: Moving thinking to doing - your journey

copy.paragraph:
Empathy is the cornerstone of a human-centered design process.
The Empathize phase focuses on the understanding of people, within the context of the challenges. This effort enabled the team to understand the way a chosen persona does things and why, including physical and emotional needs and what is meaningful to them.

The goal of the Define mode was to craft a meaningful and actionable problem statement. This a guiding statement focuses on insights and needs of a particular persona from the empathize phase. Collectively 18 Problem definition were created from the original opportunites in the format:

Ideate is the mode of the design phase in which the team concentrated on idea generation. Group voting secured the most pressing 4 problem statements as a combination of achievable, path of least resistance and Wow, we feel as though this would bring an exceptional opportunity to the market.
The Prototype phase is the iterative generation of artifacts, use cases intended to for the Persona to build out the idea connected with the problem statement.
